1243840.name: Nations At War Digital: White Star Rising Battlepack 1
1243840.description:
White Star Rising Battlepack 1

White Star Rising Battle Pack 1 takes you to the summer of 1944, and Allied forces fight to liberate occupied France from Germany. It's a titanic struggle that pits the advanced weaponry of the German Army against the airpower, artillery, and ever-improving soldiers of the Allies.


White Star Rising Battlepack 1 depicts platoon-level combat in World War II, where you'll find everything you're looking for in a platoon level game: armor, artillery, infantry serving as more than cannon fodder, command and control, air support, and desperate close assaults that leave the victor in possession of the ground and the defeated in headlong retreat. White Star Rising Battle Pack 1 includes 9 Scenarios focusing on the fighting between the Americans, their British allies, and Germans, Unit types include vehicles, soldiers, and weapons of the armies that fought in France, Belgium, and Germany in 1944-45. You'll fight battles at Omaha Beach, in the Lorraine, on the outskirts of Belgium, and in Germany itself.

White Star Rising Battlepack 1 Scenarios

Frozen and Tired
Dec 19th, 1944 Belgium

A Little Tea Before We Fight
June 6th, 1944 France

Ambush with a Surprise
June 12th, 1944 France

A Bloody Victory
June 6th, 1944 France

Objective Vierville
June 7th, 1944 France

Just Beyond the Trees
November 1944 Germany

The Tigers Still Have Teeth
March 29th, 1945 Germany

Clash at the Crossroads
July 23rd, 1944 Belgium

Erasing the Bulge
Dec 24th, 1944 Belgium
